column2: "You were awesome back there! And now that I've experienced the Tundra, I can go back by myself."
"That's how I've always been. I'm basically useless until after I've experienced something at least once."
"I know ARKS members should always be ready for the unexpected, but that's just the way I am."
"Well, see ya, partner. I hope you'll be around the next time I need you!"
